UniprotID	Q9NRY7
Accession	Q9NRY7;B4DXC3;J3KR76;Q0VAQ1;Q6NSW9;Q7Z4L7
EntryName	PLS2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Phospholipid scramblase 2 (PL scramblase 2) (Ca(2+)-dependent phospholipid scramblase 2)
GeneName	PLSCR2
Length	297
Function	May catalyze calcium-induced ATP-independent rapid bidirectional and non-specific movement of phospholipids (lipid scrambling or lipid flip-flop) between the inner and outer leaflet of the plasma membrane.
Subcellular Location	Membrane; Nucleus
